snippet: ZEIGERMAN--David. The Board of Governors and Membership of Montammy Golf Club express their deepest sorrow at the passing of their beloved member and extend their heartfelt sympathy to the entire family. Scott Tesser, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: ZEIGERMAN--David. The Board of Governors and Membership of Montammy Golf Club express their deepest sorrow at the passing of their beloved member and extend their heartfelt sympathy to the entire family. Scott Tesser, President 1/3
